Package index

All functions

make_mcp()
Minimum convex polygon around records
make_predict_boundary()
Merge polygons (or polygon files) to form a single minimum convex polygon (mcp)
png_from_preds()
Generate .png (map) files for each prediction
predict_sdm()
Predict from SDM
prep_sdm()
Prepare for running an SDM
run_full_sdm()
Run an SDM using no cross validation and previously established tune arguments
sdm_metrics
Lookup for metrics relevant to evaluating SDMs
thresh_sdm()
Threshold a previously predicted SDM
tune_sdm()
Tune, and evaluate, species distribution models
